content.en: Compression algorithms: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms to improve image and video compression. These algorithms aim to reduce block distortion, block artifacts, and improve image details in the compressed domain. They also focus on developing fast and efficient algorithms for image coding, resizing, and enhancement. The agency attributed to these algorithms is the improvement of image and video compression through their implementation.
content.da: Komprimeringsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre billed- og videokomprimering. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at reducere blokforvrængning, blokartefakter og forbedre billeddetaljer i det komprimerede domæne. De fokuserer også på at udvikle hurtige og effektive algoritmer til billedkodning, ændring af størrelse og forbedring. Disse algoritmer tilskrives forbedringen af billed- og videokomprimering gennem deres implementering.
